name: Lost In Chroma
description:
How to Play:

May be played with a keyboard or an Xbox 360 / Xbox One gamepad

Gameplay (Keyboard) -

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Pause - Escape

Menu (Keyboard) -

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Select - Enter

Back - Escape

Gameplay (Gamepad) -

Move - Left Joystick, D Pad

Pause - Start

Menu (Gamepad)

Move - Left Joystick, D Pad

Select - A

Back - B
